Data: Morkel to Marsh, no run good length outside off from over the wicket, defended on the front foot towards cover
Morkel to Marsh, no run Marsh stays on the back foot and gets squared up while defending a short of a length ball towards point
Morkel to Marsh, 1 leg bye short of a length on leg stump, Marsh tries to pull but misses and gets hit on the body
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting loves it there! The ball wasn't that short but Ponting got into position so quickly on the front foot by swivelling and pulled the ball over midwicket

Morkel to Ponting, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a quick single, Marsh's bat got stuck in the ground and he would have been out had Botha hit the stumps direct, I'm not sure Marsh realised the throw was coming at his end
Morkel to Marsh, FOUR runs driven superbly down the ground for four, that's the second such shot he's played today
Kallis to Ponting, no run defended towards backward point
Kallis to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward and drives towards Gibbs at point
Kallis to Ponting, no run another slower ball, Kallis has bowled a lot of those today, defended on the leg side
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run and yet another slower ball at 119 kmh, Ponting nudges towards mid-on and runs the single to bring up the 50 partnership
Kallis to Marsh, no run Kallis bowls a tight length on middle stump, Marsh gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run Kallis ends the over with a slow ball (116kmh), Marsh waits for it on the back foot and steers the ball past gully, who dives to his right, towards third man
Morkel to Marsh, no run good length ball at 140 kmh just outside off stump, Marsh chooses to let it go through to Boucher
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run that's a fullish ball and Marsh manages to cut it towards deep point
Morkel to Ponting, no run good length delivery from Morne, defended on the back foot
Morkel to Ponting, no run pushed on the off side on the front foot
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run steered off the front foot towards third man
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run pushed off the front foot through cover for a single to end the over
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run short of a length on leg and middle, played off the pads towards midwicket

Kallis to Ponting, 1 run dropped! Ponting's so lucky today! He tried to smash the ball over the leg side but ended up hitting the ball in the air towards van Jaarsveld at square leg, the fielder reached up over his head and got both hands to the ball but spilled it, then there was a run out chance against Marsh at the batsman's end but that was missed as well, what shambles
Kallis to Marsh, no run defended on the on side
Kallis to Marsh, no run Marsh tries to play the ball behidn square but misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, that pitched outside leg
Kallis to Marsh, no run defended on the back foot
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run the slower ball on leg stump, Marsh leans across and whips the ball towards fine leg
Morkel to Marsh, FOUR runs short ball and Marsh comes forward initially but transfers his weight on to the back foot to pull the ball through the gap at midwicket
Morkel to Marsh, no run cut off the back foot towards point
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run good length outside off but Marsh manages to come forward and play a cut towards deep point
Morkel to Ponting, no run pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
Morkel to Ponting, 2 runs Ponting strides forward and lofts a good length ball over extra cover, he was looking for the boundary but didn't time it

Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs not on that evidence! Morne drops a fraction short, Ponting comes forward and take his eyes off the ball while pulling but still manages to hit it along the ground and in the gap at deep square leg
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run pushed towards cover for a single
Kallis to Ponting, no run good length delivery angling into the right-hander, nudged of the front foot towards midwicket
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run Ponting comes forward once again and closes the face of the bat to tap the ball into the gap at midwicket
Kallis to Marsh, no run defended on the front foot once again
Kallis to Marsh, no run good length delivery outside off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover point
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run Marsh goes back to a good length delivery and hits it wide of mid-on for a single
Botha to Marsh, 1 run full toss and Marsh moves forward and drives down the ground
Botha to Ponting, 1 run bowled outside off stump, Ponting leans forward, reaches out for the ball, and pushes towards point
Botha to Marsh, 1 run Marsh stays in his crease and drives towards long-on again
Botha to Ponting, 1 run Ponting leans forward and turns a straight ball off his pads behind square, the field is spread far and wide, singles are easily available
Botha to Marsh, no run Marsh moves back to cut but gets cramped for room, he ends up hitting it to short third man
Botha to Marsh, 1 run driven off the front foot past the bowler for a single to end the over, five off it
Kallis to Marsh, no run good length delivery outside off stump, defended towards cover
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run Marsh walks across his stumps and flicks a full ball through square leg

Kallis to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward, out of his crease, and drives the ball back at Kallis who sticks out his right hand and fields, he then throws the ball back at the stumps but misses, Ponting scampered back to his crease
Kallis to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot towards point
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run driven off the front foot towards wide mid-on
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Marsh moves forward and drives down the ground for a single
Botha to Marsh, no run driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Botha to Marsh, 1 run Marsh comes forward and cuts through cover point for one
Botha to Ponting, no run defended on the leg side
Botha to Ponting, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Ponting moves back and cuts towards deep point
Botha to Marsh, 2 runs tossed up into the blockhole, Marsh makes room by moving towards leg and drives towards cover where a fumble from Gibbs allows the single
Botha to Marsh, 1 run Botha cramps Marsh for room by angling the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, Marsh moves towards leg and dabs the ball towards short third man
Kallis to Marsh, 2 runs slower ball, 117 kmh, Marsh stays in his crease and whips the ball off his pads behind square
Kallis to Marsh, no run 121.6 kmh, Marsh plays the ball towards the leg side
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run good length ball on middle stump, Marsh moves forward and taps the ball towards mid-on
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run Ponting moves forward and drives a length delivery towards wide mid-off where Albie dives to his left and cuts it off
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run Marsh moves back and nudges a good length ball off his pads through midwicket
Kallis to Ponting, no run Ponting gets on to the front foot and defends a short of a length ball towards midwicket
Botha to Marsh, no run Marsh moves towards leg to a flighted delivery and plays towards the off side
Botha to Marsh, no run awesome fielding! Gibbs leaps to his right at cover and pulls off a one handed save, Marsh timed the cover drive well
Botha to Marsh, FOUR runs Marsh goes over Gibbs this time by moving towards leg and chipping the ball over cover, the ball skids across the grass and races to the boundary
Botha to Marsh, 1 run cut down to deep point for a single

Botha to Ponting, OUT stumped! No, caught! Ponting pushed forward to a defend a straight delivery outside off stump but edged it, Boucher didn't realise at first for he whipped off the bails but eventually appealed for caught behind, Ian Gould raised the finger immediately
Botha to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Kallis to Marsh, no run wide outside off, angling away, and Marsh lets it go. Fancy doing that in an ODI?
Kallis to Marsh, no run fullish on the pads, marsh looks to turn it to leg, but doesn't find a gap
Kallis to Marsh, no run that's accurate, straight on the stumps, just short of driving length, and played to mid-off
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run this one was wider, and glided away to thirdman
Kallis to Clarke, no run just short of length, just outside off, Clarke gets on the front foot and defends it to cover
Kallis to Clarke, no run short of length, on the stumps, Clarke hasn't been in long enough to go for pull shot
Botha to Marsh, 1 run tossed up outside off, and Marsh steps out, and drives to wide of mid-off for a single
Botha to Clarke, no run Clarke steps out too, and finds the ball is shorter and defends it back
Botha to Clarke, 1 run fulltoss on the stumps, and played to long-on
Botha to Marsh, 1 run there it is, 50 for Marsh. Botha bowled this nicely, saw him come down, and shortened the length, but Marsh recovered and opened the face towards sweeper cover
Botha to Clarke, no run shortish on the stumps, and Clarke fails to find the gap in the on side
Botha to Clarke, 1 leg bye scampered single, Clarke came down, was beaten in the flight, lucky to get pad onto it, and Marsh is alert for a single
Kallis to Clarke, 2 runs well bowled and well played, honing on the stumps, tailing from outside off, and Clarke guides it to wide of mid-on, Amla chases well to keep it to two
Kallis to Clarke, no run just outside off, shortish, Clarke opens the face of the bat, but can't beat point
Kallis to Clarke, no run slower ball, 115ks, on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
Kallis to Clarke, 1 run another slower one, Clarke defends this towards mid-on this time, and calls right away for a single, which is comfortably completed
Kallis to Marsh, no run just short of length, starts on the stumps, angling across, Marsh defends with an open face
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run this was shorter, and gave marsh time to make room and guide it to sweeper cover
Morkel to Marsh, 2 runs ordinary loosener, outside leg, slow, and Marsh turns his wrists on it to take a couple to fine leg, where Amla makes a diving face
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run on the pads again, and turned away for an easy single
Morkel to Clarke, no run just short of length, on the off stump, and Clarke defends it to the bowler
Morkel to Clarke, no run fuller, around off stump, Clarke looks to drive it straight, but the bat turns in his hand, and thus he can't beat mid-on
Morkel to Clarke, no run full on the stumps, Clarke looks to turn it away but can't beat mid-on

Morkel to Clarke, FOUR runs finally gets the drive right, another overpitched delivery, just outside off, Clarke plants his front foot down, and crashes it to the right of mid-off who has no chance to save the boundary
Botha to Marsh, no run Marsh takes a step out of his crease and defends a slow delivery on the off side
Botha to Marsh, SIX runs shot! Marsh steps out of his crease, makes room by moving towards leg, and lofts the ball superbly over long-on for six!
Botha to Marsh, no run flicked off the pads behind square
Botha to Marsh, 1 run Marsh drives towards wide mid on for a single
Botha to Clarke, no run Clarke steps out but ends up defending towards the leg side
Botha to Clarke, 1 run Clarke gets down on one knee and sweeps from outside off stump
Morkel to Clarke, no run short of a length outside off stump, Clarke stays on the back foot and plays the ball towards point
Morkel to Clarke, 2 runs Morne drifts on to the pads, Clarke moves across and nudges the ball off his pads behind square
Morkel to Clarke, no run the short ball doesn't bounce that much, Clarke tries to play a short-arm pull but the ball goes under his bat
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run nudged off the front foot towards mid-on for a quick single
Morkel to Marsh, no run Marsh moves forward and then cuts a length delivery towards point
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run good length but the line is too straight, Marsh plays the ball off his pads towards square leg
Botha to Marsh, no run the quicker ball skids through on Marsh and hits him on the pad
Botha to Marsh, 1 run played off the pads towards long-on for a single
Botha to Clarke, no run Clarke strides forward and defends back towards the bowler
Botha to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, Clarke comes out of his crease and drives towards long-on
Botha to Marsh, 2 runs Marsh steps out and uses the angle into him from round the wicket to hit the ball into the gap at square leg
Botha to Marsh, 2 runs Marsh waits for the ball from his crease and cuts through cover point, excellent running, two more
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run short of a length on leg stump, played off the pads down to fine leg for a single
Morkel to Marsh, no run fuller length on middle and off, Marsh moves forward and pushes towards mid-off
Morkel to Marsh, no run good length just outside off stump, Marsh opens the face and plays the ball towards point

Morkel to Marsh, 1 run dropped! Marsh leans forward to flick the slower ball but ends up mis-hitting it in the air towards midwicket, McKenzie dives to his left but ends up diving over the ball, he only just got fingertips to it, South Africa have not matched their usual high standards in the field
Morkel to Clarke, no run defended back to the bowler
Morkel to Clarke, no run driven of the front foot towards the off side
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Marsh punches it past the bowler and runs the single before mid-off gets to the ball
Morkel to Clarke, no run good length on off stump, Clarke can't leave the crease so he pushes towards cover on the front foot
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run that's a bit too short so Clarke has the room to pull the ball from outside off towards square
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run driven off the front foot towards mid-off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but Marsh is too quick
Morkel to Clarke, 3 runs too full on leg stump, Clarke flicks the ball between long leg an deep square leg, van Jaarsveld runs to his right and fields
Morkel to Marsh, no run good length delivery on middle and off, Marsh goes back and punches towards the bowler, Albie sticks his left hand out and fields
Botha to Clarke, no run a bit short on off stump, Clarke moves back and nudges the ball towards short fine leg
Botha to Clarke, 1 wide shouts of catch after Clarke misses the sweep, the umpire calls it wide for the ball was down leg side
Botha to Clarke, no run played towards midwicket
Botha to Clarke, no run that was the quicker one, 101 kmh, on middle stump, Clarke defends on the back foot
Botha to Clarke, no run played off the pads towards midwicket where Gibbs cuts off any runs
Botha to Clarke, no run Clarke lunges forward and defends a good length ball on the leg side
Botha to Clarke, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards long on for a single, only two runs off the over
Morkel to Clarke, no run played back to the bowler on the front foot
Morkel to Clarke, no run tight line and length on off and middle, Clarke has to stay in his crease because Boucher is standing up, he defends to the bowler

Morkel to Clarke, OUT caught in the deep! The pressure was building on Clarke and he went for it, lofting a length ball off the front foot towards long-on, Amla was on the boundary and he had to take several steps back to hold the catch, he took a quick look behind to see where the rope was, it was a few feet away from him
Morkel to Hussey, no run excellent line and length, on middle stump, Hussey stays in his crease and defends to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays on the back foot and opens the face late to guide the ball towards third man
Morkel to Marsh, no run the slower one at 112 kmh, Marsh adjusted late and defended towards the bowler
Duminy to Hussey, no run played off the pads towards short fine leg
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run Hussey leans forward and works the ball towards midwicket for one
Duminy to Marsh, 1 run Marsh makes room by moving towards leg and drives a ball which angles into him from round the wicket towards long off
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run driven down the ground towards long on, Australia reach 150
Duminy to Marsh, 2 runs Duminy fires the ball into the blockhole, Marsh makes room and drives through cover
Duminy to Marsh, 1 run that's a dangerous shot, Marsh tried to cut the ball from middle stump, he bottom-edged it into the ground past the stumps and the wicket-keeper
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run Marsh gets a single by working a good length ball off his pads behind square
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Albie gets the ball to swing into the right-hander, Hussey digs it out from the blockhole towards point and sets off immediately
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run slower ball on leg stump, Marsh stays in his crease, swivels, and pulls towards long leg
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves forward and drives a good length ball towards mid-off for another single
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run fuller length and Marsh drives firmly off the front foot towards long on, the fielder is on the boundary for him
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run flicked off the pads towards midwicket where Duminy dives to his right and saves runs, there's a mix-up between the batsmen but they make the single
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run short and wide outside off stump, Hussey reached out for it and cut through cover, it might have been wide had he let it go
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run Marsh goes back and fends at a length delivery from Steyn, he gets an outside edge towards third man
Steyn to Hussey, no run banged in short outside off stump at 143 kmh, Hussey lets the ball pass
Steyn to Hussey, 1 wide short and wide again, Hussey doesn't connect with the swipe and this time it's been called wide by the umpire
Steyn to Hussey, 2 runs driven towards mid-off for a single, the fielder throws at the non-striker's end but fine leg hasn't come in to back up
Steyn to Hussey, no run banged in short outside off stump, Hussey sways out of the way

Steyn to Hussey, 2 runs dropped! And it's a sitter! Steyn dug the ball in short again outside off stump, Hussey went back and cut the ball high in the air over cover point, van Jaarsveld ran in from the boundary, slid on to his knees as he reached the ball but spilled it, that's his second drop of the day, what a poor debut he's having in the field
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run cut down to third man for a single
Morkel to Hussey, 2 runs full ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot through cover
Morkel to Hussey, no run short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
Morkel to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to cut but misses
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Hussey jumps back and nudges a short of a length delivery off his hips towards square leg
Morkel to Marsh, no run defended on the front foot towards Gibbs at point
Steyn to Hussey, no run good length ball outside off stump, 148 kmh, Hussey lets it go again
Steyn to Hussey, no run sharp short ball at 144 kmh, Hussey lifts his hands out of the way in a hurry
Steyn to Hussey, no run Hussey went on the back foot and cut a short of a length ball hard towards point where Gibbs fields and gets ready to throw if the batsmen dare take a run

Steyn to Hussey, no run the slower one outside off stump, Hussey dabs the ball towards backward point where Gibbs fields again, this time Hussey goes for the single but gets sent back, Gibbs throws but misses, Hussey was short of his crease
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs cracking shot! Hussey moves forward and cuts the ball hard past Gibbs towards the boundary, brilliant timing
Steyn to Hussey, no run fuller ball on off stump, defended towards the off side, no runs in the over apart from that four

Morkel to Marsh, OUT caught! Good length from Morkel, he pitches in line with the stumps and moves the ball off the seam away from the left-hander, Marsh tries to close the face and play the ball on the leg side, the ball hits the hilly side of the bat and goes through to Boucher

Morkel to White, 1 run White moves across his crease and nudges the ball off his hips towards midwicket, Duminy swoops on the ball, turns around and throws at the bowler's end, he misses but White would have been just in anyway
Morkel to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey leans forward and drives a full ball through cover for two more
Morkel to Hussey, no run short of a length outside off stump, Hussey gets on to the back foot and defends towards point
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Hussey cuts towards third man, Steyn throws the ball towards Boucher, it's a difficult one to collect and he gets hit on the body
Morkel to White, no run short of a length outside off stump, the ball leaps up at White who fends it away towards point
Botha to Hussey, 1 run nudged off the pads towards midwicket for a single
Botha to White, 1 run glanced off the pads towards short fine leg, Hussey is so quick that the fielder has to throw to the bowler's end, White makes it too
Botha to Hussey, no run defended towards midwicket
Botha to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long on for one
Botha to White, no run White stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
Botha to White, no run good stuff from Botha, only three off the over, White nudges the last ball off his pads towards short fine leg
Kallis to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long on for a single
Kallis to White, no run short of a length on off and middle, White stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler
Kallis to White, no run White goes back to play the ball on the leg side, Kallis bowls a slower one and White closes the face of the bat too early, he gets a leading edge towards cover
Kallis to White, 1 run White goes back again and works the ball towards square leg for a quick single
Kallis to Hussey, no run 115 kmh, Kallis bowls a cutter outside off stump, Hussey pushes towards point, he won't get a single, Australia have scored only 9 off the last 16 balls
Kallis to Hussey, no run another slower cutter, Hussey plays it straight to point again, Australia are stagnating a little
Botha to White, 1 run bowled full on off and middle, White drives the ball towards wide long on
Botha to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves across his stumps and nudge sthe ball to short fine leg where McKenzie fields, the batsmen run a very risky single but Hussey runs between the ball and the stumps
Botha to White, 1 run full toss played through square leg
Botha to Hussey, 1 run played through midwicket for another single
Botha to White, 1 run driven down the ground towards long on
Botha to Hussey, no run Botha ends the over with a dot ball, Hussey defends towards Gibbs at midwicket
Kallis to White, no run short of a length outside off stump, White cuts off the back foot but can't get past point
Kallis to White, FOUR runs blasted! White makes room to a length delivery and launches the slower one flat over mid-off, the ball bounces once before going over the rope
Kallis to White, 1 run a low full toss, White makes room but hits it towards cover, he'll be disappointed with that
Kallis to Hussey, 1 run Kallis bowls full and straight, Hussey drives off the front foot to long on
Kallis to White, no run 125 kmh, White makes room but ends up defending a good length ball towards cover
Kallis to White, 1 run Kallis bowls a full ball into the blockhole, driven to long on once again, Kallis finishes an excellent spell, 10 overs for 35 runs
Morkel to White, 1 run he falls over as he delivers the ball on a good length outside off, White drives towards long off
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run length delivery outside off stump once again, Hussey drives off the front foot towards long off
Morkel to White, no run White began to make room by moving towards leg but Albie followed him, White ended up playing it to midwicket
Morkel to White, 1 run White makes room again and nudges the ball behind square
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs the slower ball but it's too short, Hussey gets into position quickly and pulls the ball along the ground to the deep backward square leg boundary, Australia go past 200
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Albie ends the over with an attempted yorker, Hussey plays it towards the leg side
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs shot! Hussey makes room and slices a short of a length ball over point for four, he's going to take Steyn on for sure
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run Hussey makes room and drives the ball powerfully towards long off
Steyn to White, 1 run bowled full outside off stump, White stays in his crease and drives towards long off for one more
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run Steyn bowls a full ball at 139 kmh, Hussey mis-hits towards midwicket and gets only a single
Steyn to White, FOUR runs that's a poor ball, a full toss on leg stump, White gets under it and helps the ball towards the long leg boundary, he didn't try to hit it hard at all

Steyn to White, 1 run he's smashed it right back at Hussey! White made room and hit the ball very hard, Hussey had to scramble, the ball definitely lost pace so it must have hit some part of the non-striker
Steyn to Haddin, FOUR runs super shot! Haddin stays in his crease, waits for a short and wide ball, and cuts wide of the fielder at third man, precise placement
Steyn to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin opens the face and guides the ball to Amla at third man, Haddin sprints back for the second
Steyn to Haddin, no run nudged towards midwicket, Wait! is the call but the fielder cuts it off
Steyn to Haddin, 1 run Haddin steps out and backs away to make room, Steyn bowls a short one and Haddin hits it down to third man, the ball reaches Amla on the bounce
Steyn to Hopes, no run the slower on on middle stump, nudged on the leg side
Steyn to Hopes, 2 runs Amla in action again after Hopes gets a bottom edge while trying to cut the ball, the batsmen run two again
Morkel to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin makes room and scoops the ball over the bowler's head, he checked his shot and placed it well between long on and off
Morkel to Haddin, 2 runs too full on leg stump, poor line when fine leg is in the circle, Steyn dives to his left to cut off Haddin's flick
Morkel to Haddin, 5 wide that's an awful ball, full and far down leg side, Boucher had no chance, five wides, what a gift for Australia
Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs Morkel's bleeding here, Haddin gets on to the front foot and pulls a length ball over midwicket for four, crisp hit
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run driven off the front foot towards midwicket
Morkel to Hopes, no run Hopes tries to launch a length ball over cover but misses

Morkel to Hopes, OUT van Jaarsveld finally catches one! He has relief written all over his face and he turns to the MCG crowd and gives them a stare. Hopes made room to hit over the off side but didn't get enough muscle behind the shot, he lofted the ball towards long off, van Jaarsveld ran in from the boundary and judged it well

Botha to White, 1 run well done Steyn! White made room by moving towards leg and drove a full toss towards wide mid-off, it would have been four had it gone past the fielder but Steyn moved to his left and dived to save runs, he fell on his shoulder and is in a bit of pain, it's Steyn's left shoulder
Botha to Hussey, 2 runs that's a high full toss, Hussey pulls towards deep midwicket
Botha to Hussey, no run Hussey makes room and tries to drive on the off side but gets yorked
Botha to Hussey, FOUR runs that's a horrible ball, a friendly full toss and Hussey gleefully accepts the offering, he hammers the ball over mid-off for four
Botha to Hussey, 1 run driven down the ground towards long on for one
Botha to White, OUT bowled him! That was a fast ball in the blockhole, 106 kmh! White tried to swat the ball towards midwicket but missed, Botha hit off stump
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs loose ball, a full toss on the pads, Hussey flicks the ball off his pads towards the long leg boundary, that's his fifty! van Jaarsveld's drop has cost South Africa
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run driven down the ground for a single
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run another low full toss, Haddin flicks towards van Jaarsveld at deep square leg
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run full ball on middle stump, driven off the front foot towards long off
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run good length and line on off stump, Haddin drives towards mid-off for one more

Morkel to Hussey, OUT knocked him over! Albie bowls a good length ball on off and middle stump with a hint of swing into the right-hander, Hussey tries to hit across the line towards midwicket but misses, the ball crashes into off and middle stump

Steyn to Bracken, 2 runs Bracken pushes forward to a full ball and plays it past point for two runs, that ball hit the bat twice! The ball hit the inside edge and the outside edge according to hot spot, weird
Steyn to Bracken, no run defended on the back foot towards the off side
Steyn to Bracken, 1 run nudged towards short square leg for a single
Steyn to Haddin, 1 run Haddin waits for the slower one and pushes towards midwicket for one more
Steyn to Bracken, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Bracken drive the ball fluently through cover point for a single

Steyn to Haddin, OUT The South Africans have finally scored a run out! Haddin pushes the ball towards cover an sets off for the single to keep strike for the final over, Albie rushes in, picks up, turns around, and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end, Haddin's well short
Morkel to Hilfenhaus, 1 run pushed off the front foot past Gibbs at point
Morkel to Bracken, FOUR runs take that! Bracken stands his ground and smashes a short ball over midwicket for four, Morkel's length is wrong
Morkel to Bracken, 2 runs Morkel follows up with a full ball and Bracken chips the ball down the ground towards long-off, Hilfenhaus races back for the second
Morkel to Bracken, 2 runs Bracken makes room by moving towards leg and slices the ball over backward point, two more
Morkel to Bracken, 1 bye Bracken makes room and swings but misses, that was the slower one, Hilfenhaus is quick enough to steal the bye
Morkel to Hilfenhaus, 1 wide what an absurd ball! It was miles down leg side and Boucher did extremely well to dive to his left and save five wides
Morkel to Hilfenhaus, 1 bye Hilfenhaus misses the slower ball and Bracken manages to steal the bye again
I'll be back in 40 minutes for the chase. You could spend the break trying our quiz, or by checking out Cricinfo 3D.

"I've got an answer to the question asked back in over # 2 about two sets of brothers on opposing teams. There was a response that the last time was the Waugh and Flower brothers in 2001 - I have found (don't ask how) that on October 19 2008, that brothers Lamech Onyango and Nehemiah Odhiambo turned out for Kenya against Nial and Kevin O'Brien for Ireland. Hardly earth shattering teams, but it's an international

5.41pm: Would you believe it, South Africa have finished their overs four minutes early! Australia ended up with 271 for 8, they benefited from a few missed run-out chances and dropped catches. The South Africans were uncharacteristically lax in the field.
Right, we're moments away from South Africa's chase. Gibbs and Amla will begin their pursuit of 272. Bracken will open the bowling, from over the wicket. Who's your money on?
Bracken to Gibbs, no run short of a length angling across the right-hander from over the wicket, Gibbs moves across to cover his stumps before letting it go
Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs Gibbs gets going by turning a ball off his pads towards Tait at fine leg
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run full on leg stump once again, Gibbs leans across and flicks towards fine leg for one this time
Bracken to Amla, 1 run short of a length on leg and middle, Amla moves back and nudges the ball off his pads towards square leg for one
Bracken to Gibbs, no run good length on middle and leg, Gibbs stays in his crease and nudges towards midwicket
Bracken to Gibbs, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
Tait to Amla, no run 145 kmh on a good length around off and middle, defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Tait to Kallis, 1 wide Tait's fired the ball down leg side at 150kmh, Haddin does supremely well to move to his left and collect
Tait to Kallis, 1 wide he's up above 150 kmh this time - 151 - but the line is still down leg side, Kallis misses the glance but that's wide

Tait to Gibbs, no run short and wide outside off stump, Kallis chooses to let it go through

Bracken to Kallis, no run Kallis goes back in his crease and opens the face to play a good length ball towards point

Bracken to Kallis, no run wider outside off this time, Kallis punches to short cover off the back foot
Bracken to Kallis, no run Bracken ends a maiden over with a slower cutter at 114 kmh, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Tait to Gibbs, no run good length and straight from Tait, Gibbs gets behind the line and defends from his crease
Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs Gibbs has dismissed that! It was bowled short at 147 kmh outside off stump, Gibbs just stood on the front foot and pulled it in front of midwicket for four
Tait to Gibbs, no run slower ball on middle stump, Gibbs moves back and pushes towards mid-on
Tait to Gibbs, no run full and straight from Tait at 148 kmh, Gibbs pushes towards the off side with a straight bat
Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs shot! The short ball from Tait sits up outside off stump, Gibbs stands tall on the front foot and swats the ball behind square for four more
Tait to Gibbs, 3 runs fuller length this time but Gibbs uses the leg-stump line to flick through the gap between midwicket and mid on
Bracken to Gibbs, no run good length on off stump, defended on the front foot by Gibbs

Bracken to Gibbs, no run fuller and straighter from Bracken, Gibbs moves forward and defends with a straight bat towards the bowler

Bracken to Gibbs, no run Bracken pitches around off and seams the ball across the right-hander, Gibbs lets it go

Tait to Morkel, no run driven firmly off the front foot but straight to cover
Tait to Morkel, 1 run Morkel drives the full ball down the ground for a single to long on
Tait to Botha, no run Tait swings the yorker into the right-hander, Botha tries to drive but mis-times it towards mid-off
Tait to Botha, no run they just can't find the gap! Botha hits the full ball to midwicket, the gap between runs and balls is widening
Tait to Botha, no run Botha tries to smash the ball through the off side but gets a bottom edge, only one run off the first Powerplay over
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, FOUR runs Albie finds the boundary with the square drive! He frees his arms and lashes the ball behind point but wide of third man
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, 1 run Albie wants to hit down the ground but gets an outside edge down to third man, they've got five off the first two balls
Hilfenhaus to Botha, 1 leg bye Botha gets down on one knee to paddle the ball down to fine leg, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Hilfenhaus appeals but the ball hit the pad outside off
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, FOUR runs smashed! Hilfenhaus gives Albie width, he frees his arms and blazes the ball over extra cover for four, one bounce over the boundary
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, 1 run Albie gets cramped for room and gets an inside edge on to the body, Botha calls him through for the quick single
Hilfenhaus to Botha, 1 run Hilfenhaus bowls one in the blockhole, Botha plays it out towards cover, 12 off the over
Bracken to Botha, 1 run he bowls a slower yorker which Botha manages to drive towards long off, over to Albie
Bracken to Morkel, 2 runs low full toss and Albie slogs it towards wide long-on for two more
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run Albie comes down the track, Bracken drops the ball shorter, Albie steers towards short third man
Bracken to Botha, 2 runs Botha swings the full ball into the gap at midwicket, they'll get two more
Bracken to Botha, 1 run the slower ball outside off stump, Botha lines it up and slogs towards deep square leg, just the single this time
Bracken to Morkel, SIX runs that's hammered several rows back! Albie gets under a length delivery and clobbers it with a perfectly straight bat over the bowler's head, terrific strike!
Hilfenhaus to Botha, FOUR runs poor line! Too full on leg stump and Botha leans across and flicks the ball past short fine leg for four, awful line when fine leg is in the circle
Hilfenhaus to Botha, 1 run dug out towards White at cover for a single, Botha's a goner if White hits at the bowler's end but he misses

Hilfenhaus to Morkel, FOUR runs Albie's doing it! He's doing it! He moves back to a delivery on leg stump and whips it off his pads past the fielder at short fine leg, superb placement, Tait can't stop it with his dive
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, FOUR runs Albie Morkel! He waits for a short of a length ball to angle into him, and then opens the face to steer the ball between the keeper and short third man for four
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, 2 runs full toss and Albie hits it to Marsh at deep midwicket, he fires the throw back in but can't stop the single
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, 3 runs Albie gets an edge towards Bracken at short third man, and he fumbles! He fumbles to allow two extra runs! 18 off the over!
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run slower ball and Albie hits it gently towards long-on for a single
Bracken to Botha, no run Botha goes back to cut but gets beaten outside off stump, Haddin is standing up to the stumps
Bracken to Botha, no run Botha tries to hit one outside off too hard but misses once again, another dot ball

Bracken to Botha, no run Botha tries to slog again, what is he doing?! He misses and gets hit on the body, he wants the single but gets sent back, Clarke throws the ball to Haddin who breaks the stumps, Botha dives desperately and just makes it back
Bracken to Botha, 1 run shorter length and Botha pulls towards deep midwicket for a single, over to Albie

Bracken to Morkel, 3 runs Albie goes back to a length ball and pulls towards deep midwicket, it's heading for the boundary but White dives full length and cuts it off, they run three! Albie keeps the strike
Hilfenhaus to Morkel, 1 run full toss, Albie swings, Albie edges towards short fine leg, he runs the single, the scores are level
Hilfenhaus to Botha, no run Botha swings hard, looking for the big hit down the ground, he inside edges on to his boot, dot ball!

Hilfenhaus to Botha, 1 run South Africa have won! Botha pushes a low full toss towards mid-off and runs frantically, David Hussey runs in to try and score a run out, but he fumbles, he doesn't pick up, the batsmen complete the single, what scenes of celebration! Botha pumps his fists
The next game is on Sunday in Hobart. That one is a day game. That's about it from us at Cricinfo today. Thank you for all your emails, it's been fun. This is George Binoy signing off, good night!
South Africa won by 3 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Albie Morkel, SA
